code: import React,{useState}from'react';import{handleError}from'../utils';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function ExpenseForm(_ref){let{addTransaction}=_ref;const[expenseInfo,setExpenseInfo]=useState({amount:'',text:''});const handleChange=e=>{const{name,value}=e.target;const copyExpenseInfo={...expenseInfo};copyExpenseInfo[name]=value;setExpenseInfo(copyExpenseInfo);};const addExpenses=e=>{e.preventDefault();const{amount,text}=expenseInfo;if(!amount||!text){handleError('Please add Expense Details');return;}addTransaction(expenseInfo);setExpenseInfo({amount:'',text:''});};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"container",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{children:"Expense Tracker"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("form",{onSubmit:addExpenses,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("label",{htmlFor:"text",children:"Expense Detail"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{onChange:handleChange,type:"text",name:"text",placeholder:"Enter your Expense Detail...",value:expenseInfo.text})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("label",{htmlFor:"amount",children:"Amount"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{onChange:handleChange,type:"number",name:"amount",placeholder:"Enter your Amount...",value:expenseInfo.amount})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{type:"submit",children:"Add Expense"})]})]});}export default ExpenseForm;
